duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate turret press to trim, punch, and shape metal.
Complete daily press Safety Checklist and report any issues to the lead and/or supervisor.
Inspect work pieces for conformance to specifications and visually or using gauges or templates, and adjust machine to correct errors.

Read job order or work instruction for product specifications such as dimensions and tolerances, and tooling instructions such as fixtures, feed rates, cutting speeds, depth of cut, and determine sequence of operations.
Monitor production efficiencies to ensure product flow and report manufacturing problems to Technical Team Lead or supervisor.
Support Production team lead as necessary when required and maintain inventory accuracy for assigned area by reporting production and material moves.

education_certification.credential: High school education or equivalent. 2 – 5 years manufacturing experience.
